TextOption.Value: The finger-nose-finger on the right is normal.
The finger-nose-finger on the right is normal, finger-nose-finger on the left is normal.
The finger-nose-finger on the right is normal, but there is dysmetria on the left.
The finger-nose-finger on the left is normal.
The finger-nose-finger on the left is normal, but there is dysmetria on the right.
The finger-nose-fever test demonstrates dysmetria on the right.
The finger-nose-fever test demonstrates dysmetria on the left.
